snippet: Gregory Wasson, the drugstore chain’s chief, said it would take an earnings loss rather than accept Express Scripts’ proposal to pay below-average rates to the company.
abstract: Walgreen Co chief executive Gregory Wasson says company will take an earnings loss rather than accept Express Scripts’ proposal to pay below-average rates to the company.
lead_paragraph: Gregory Wasson, the drugstore chain’s chief, said it would take an earnings loss rather than accept Express Scripts’ proposal to pay below-average rates to the company.

headline.seo: Walgreen Stands Firm on Decision to End Express Scripts Deal
headline.main: Walgreen Is Firm on End of Express Scripts Deal
headline.print_headline: Walgreen Is Firm on End Of Express Scripts Deal
